title: Constant 150 ms ping
body:
Hello guys, I'm euw player and  for the last 3 days I've been having this weird ping problem, and i need your help. 
 
 
So this is what's going on , my ping is normally around 50 to 60 ms and after this pass few days my ping went to 150 ms and it doesn't went down, it has been like this for 3 days already and honestly I have no idea what to do 
more, I have tried every possible fix there is for me to try and none of it worked. 
pls help. 
 
 
sry for bad English.

replies.body: I have the exact same prob in euw and this has been going on for 3 days too pls help us :)

There could be a network problem reaching the game servers, but your ISP may have changed how it's routing as well if this ping has been constant.  To rule out local possibilities, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Test it out after and let me know what you find.

I too have this problem i heard that it has, somehow,  to do with the isp (server) of the region that may be malfunctioning but have seen no riot staff acknoledge the issue nor any efforts towards fixing it. 

Rito pls
